Hand Sanitizer will be available to use at the door and the register please apply it upon entering the shop and exiting. We appreciate your cooperation and understanding. STL Herbs and Aromatics handmade herbal products are created with the finest quality organic and wildcrafted ingredients. We encourage utilizing plant medicine through delicious herbal infusions, concentrated extracts and the informed use of aromatic plant material know as Aromatherapy. Many of the plants we use in our production come from our own garden or are sustainably foraged by us. We distill many of our own plants into a line of hydrosols. These floral waters are the water soluble by-product of Essential Oil distillation and have endless uses both topically and internally.
